'''''Ancient Wind''''' is a [[Crimson Wish]] World Quest in [[Dragonspine]], [[Mondstadt]].

==Steps==
{{Quest Description|The only thing that still calls out across [[Dragonspine]] is the biting, icy wind. Nonetheless, the ley lines will sometimes produce tiny Anemo elemental particles. Complete this natural challenge and you may obtain the red crystals that the ancient tree desires...}}
;Version 1
